short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore and engage more on X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your experience on X with Bonfire

Bonfire is your X companion that helps you have better experience on X with simple toggles

- Hide user metrics: follower, following, subscriptions
- Hide post metrics: views, bookmarks, likes, reposts
- Hide left side bar menu items
- Hide right side bar suggestions and trends
- Auto like, follow and unfollow
